location: A room in the Garter Inn.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Sir, the Germans desire to have three of your horses: the duke himself will be to-morrow at court, and they are going to meet him.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: What duke should that be comes so secretly? I hear not of him in the court. Let me speak with the gentlemen: they speak English?

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Ay, sir; I'll call them to you.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: They shall have my horses; but I'll make them pay; I'll sauce them: they have had my house a week at command; I have turned away my other guests: they must come off; I'll sauce them. Come.
